General.Name: ShenZhen YUTO Packaging Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: ShenZhen YUTO Packaging Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of paper printing and packaging products in China and internationally. The company offers color boxes, gift boxes, manuals, stickers, corrugated boxes, and molded pulp trays. It serves ICT, health, tobacco, cosmetics, wine, and other industries. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
